question: Read the given statements and choose the correct option:
Statement I: Gemmae are green, unicellular, sexual buds which develop in receptacles called gemma cups
Statement II: Protonema develops directly from a spore
choices: Statement I is true but Statement II is false
Statement I is false but Statement II is true
Both Statement I and Statement II are false
Both Statement I and Statement II are true
explanation: Gemmae are multicellular, asexual buds (Statement I is false). Protonema develops directly from a spore in mosses (Statement II is true) [cite: 340-348, 478].
